Name: [Hollow] Herbarium
Desc: Every 10 Pressure reduces all squad members' DMG taken from attacks by <color=#2BAD00>1.5%</color>. (Current mitigation: {CReplaceCardParam:DamageShow_1001018,-0.01,2}%)
Desc2: A collection of leaf specimens. The back of every leaf has a note about what plant it came from.
